section.title: DataSourceChild SBB
section.para: DataSourceChild SBB is responsible for two tasks. First one is to persist registration data in some sort of a storage. Second is to callback SIP Registrar SBB with result of operation invoked on DataSourceChild SBB local interface.

This example uses DataSourceChild SBB implementation which interacts with database by means of JDBC Resource Adaptor. This following sections contain not only general description of DataSourceChild SBB , they contain description of specific implementation of said SBB.

section.title: Local interface
section.para: DataSourceChild SBB declares SBB Local interface. This interface is used by SIP Registrar SBB to trigger DataSourceChild SBB to perform certain operation on storage in which registration data is beeing held.
